author: Jan

comments.content:
Clearface, Korinna or to cool it down a bit, Candida comes in my mind. I love Belwe, hehe.

Edit: One more this time – Bookman

Thanks, Thomas.  
Yeah, I love Belwe, too. I’m glad to have a project here where it actually fits.

Clearface, Korinna and Cheltenham look too - ehm - ITCish for my taste. Candida is too similar. I’d like to have some contrast, but also harmony. I think it should be rather a serif, but sans suggestions are welcome as well.
Just curious – what did you do in the end, Jan?
I used Scala Serif and Sans.
Ah, it went another direction, thanks

Well, I kept the Belwe titles/heads and used Scala for text.  
I tried about everything from above but nothing really worked for me.  
I’m still not sure if Scala is the best choice but there comes the time when you have to make a decision ;-)
